quest.name: Following the Grain
journal:
 Quest Sync
Hastelot is in over his head.
objectives: Investigate the trail of scattered grain east of Wright.
Investigate the trail of scattered grain west of the Chisel.
Confront the former Eulmoran soldier and defeat the bandits.

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, misssir...? Please tell me you're a warrior of some kind...

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: You see, there's a gang of bandits who've moved into the area. They used to be residents of Eulmore, but were exiled for stealing from free citizens.

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: Now they've taken to stealing from us instead. And anyone who tries to stand up to them gets a good beating for their trouble...

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: Folk say they're former soldiers, and seeing how those bastards fight, I'm inclined to believe them.

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: We're just farmers here! We need someone who can stand up to them─someone who knows their way around a weapon! Could you be that person for us...?

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: You'll teach them a lesson, then!? Oh, thank you!

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: We've already hatched a plan to track down their camp─poked a hole in a harvest sack and left it as bait. There's a trail of grain now, leading away from the village to the east, so you might want to start your search there.

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: Head out to the east and look for the trail of grain─it should lead you right to their camp.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The trail of grain continues to the east...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The trail of grain takes a sharp turn to the south...

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03357
dialogue.text: Bah, we've got us a sneaky rat, boys! Better grab it by the tail afore it squeaks to its mates!

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: You...took care of them? I can hardly believe it!

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: We work long and hard for the food we harvest, and to have it all snatched away by those brutes...

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: You'd think with all that training and discipline they'd have an easy time adjusting to an honest life in the field. But I suppose some men are cruel by nature.

dialogue.name: HASTELOT
dialogue.text: At least there are good people like you still around to renew my faith in the world. You have our thanks!
